content:
Our editors and correspondents discuss the events shaping the world next week

As government departments remain unfunded in America, we look at a constitutional principle that may be damaged in the standoff. Brazil’s new president Jair Bolsonaro moves to make guns more easily available. And another shutdown: of this programme. We look back on “The week ahead”, and look forward to what’s next.

ex: n. 记者；通讯员；通信者

She's a poor correspondent(= she does not write regularly) .
This room has been set aside for the department files.
这个房间已被用来存放本部门的案卷。
The manager deputed the running of the  to his secretary.
经理把部门的管理工作委托给他秘书了。

Title: The price of the American government shutdown
